channel.title: Adding a shop to an npc?
channel.description: can someone please tell me how to add a shop id into an npc, i know the shop id but dont know how to add it into an npc. thanks in advance

item.title: Adding a shop to an npc?
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

[quote=“gnomez, post:2, topic:383377”]in client.java search WanneShop untill you find something like this

if(NPCID == 2537){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 43;
}

then just change that
if(NPCID == npcidgoeshere){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = shopidgoeshere;
}
i assume thats what you mean by add it to a npc
and i also assume that its a 317 ur talking about[/quote]What if he/she isn’t using a horribad written source though?

Read full topic
item.source: Adding a shop to an npc?

item.title: Adding a shop to an npc?

item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

in client.java search WanneShop untill you find something like this

if(NPCID == 2537){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 43;
}

then just change that
if(NPCID == npcidgoeshere){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = shopidgoeshere;
}
i assume thats what you mean by add it to a npc
and i also assume that its a 317 ur talking about
